text: Halloween II is a 1981 American horror thriller movie. It is set in Illinois. It is the second movie in the Halloween movie series. ==Cast== *Donald Pleasence as Dr. Sam Loomis *Jamie Lee Curtis as Laurie Strode *Nancy Loomis as Annie Brackett *Charles Cyphers as Sheriff Lee Brackett *Dick Warlock as Michael Myers ("the Shape") == Other websites == * Category:1981 horror movies Category:1980s sequel movies Category:1980s serial killer movies Category:American sequel movies Category:American serial killer movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Halloween movies Category:Halloween (franchise) movies Category:Movies directed by John Carpenter Category:Movies directed by Rick Rosenthal Category:Movies set in Illinois Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:American teen horror movies Category:1980s horror thriller movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:Slasher movies Category:Movies set in hospitals Category:1981 thriller movies
title: Halloween II
